reviewText: I can not view it on any of my DVD Players not even Blu-ray player
HD DVD - Fall in New England won't play on my Sony HD DVD player or Computer have even tried downloading programmes that say they can play these DVDs but no luck.............coming back.
I put it in Toshiba HD-XA2 player a few times - disk format not recognized. It has HD DVD labeled, but doesn't have the HD-DVD log  like other HD disc I have. Had to return it to Amazon.

I think I may have enjoyed all of the living landscapes DVD's.  They were in HD DVD mode and I could not find a player that would play them.  I was told they no longer make them (players or this format), blue-ray beat them out I guess.  They did not play on blue-ray, my regular DVD player or my computer.  If they ever become available in these formats (not HD DVD) I would want to see them.
